channel.title: Questions - updated!
channel.description:
hi guys
question 1.
what id is the godsword enim for walking, standing, running, and attacking? please supply all or how to get them
question 2. how can i make something be said like a yell command that says SERVER: Forums are at ********** - go there ! every like 5 mins? thanks!

item.title: Questions - updated!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“0mg Noob, post:1, topic:300302”]hi guys

question 1.

what id is the godsword enim for walking, standing, running, and attacking? please supply all or how to get them

question 2. how can i make something be said like a yell command that says
SERVER: Forums are at ********** - go there !
every like 5 mins? thanks![/quote]

  1. Teamview me; I have multiple gfx, anims, emotes, and such.
  2. Use a timer to autotype.

Read full topic
